description:
Discover what's hot and what's not to miss in the Cinema and on DVD with MovieMate for webOS. Using a sleek touch-centric UI, MovieMate presents regionalised movie listings showing what's new in cinema's worldwide. Care to see upcoming movies? MovieMate has it covered. Want to discover what's hot on DVD or soon to be released? It's all there for you!
MovieMate also offers a comprehensive film search function, allowing you to search by full or partial film title. Detailed synopsis, cast, director and associated meta-data is all beautifully presented along with movie recommendations direct to your webOS device.
MovieMate offers a wide range of regions, personalising the movie lists to your country of origin or interest. Just change your country and refresh the screen to see regionalised movie data (where available).

If movies are your thing, or you just want to find a film for Saturday night's entertainment, MovieMate for webOS is sure to fit your needs!
versionNote: New York Times integration (reviews, showtimes, awards etc.); Bug Fixes;
